instruct_text: Welcome to the Job Simulator Task!
In this task, you'll be assuming various perspectives of jobs while reading stories.
First, you’ll be introduced to perspectives of 8 different jobs.
For example, you may be asked to read a story in a restaurant and you’ll be asked to view the story as a Restaurant Critic.
You’ll then learn 4 questions associated with each perspective, and you’ll use these to interrogate the stories.
For example, if you are a Restaurant Critic, you’ll learn to ask questions about the restaurant decor, menus, and the quality of the food.
After learning all the questions, you’ll read 8 stories, applying one perspective you’ve learned to each one.
While reading, try to keep in mind the perspective and questions.
